name: Crown Supreme
description: The Crown Supreme Jacket is a fitted sporty unisex hoody in a Flex Fleece fabric. The unique Flex Fleece, a 50/50 cotton/poly blend, provides a perfect surface for embellishment.

name: Power In One Beanie
description: Empower lifestyles with the PIO black, red and grey pom beanie.  Order yours today at the introductory price of $20.00.  The price will go up soon.

name: Power In One Signature Crew Neck Sweatshirt
description: This light weight Sports Grey crewneck sweatshirt features a new version of the PIO logo in black & red print with the 'Empowering Lifestyles' motto on the back tagline.  Stimulate your power and others in the Signature PIO Sweatshirt.

name: The POWER 'Re-Mix" Snapback
description:
The POWER 'Re-Mix'  features Puff Stitch on the front and the Power In One logo on the back.  

This Snapback is worn to symbolize a statement of qualification.   Qualifying the wearer to engage in their activities with strength, courage and spirit without fear or timidity.  This hat reminds all that interact with you that you are exercising your POWER to effect change.  Your outerwear is a reflection of your inner you. The POWER 'Re-Mix' is available in limited supply!!!

Available in Navy Stars, Black Stars, Royal Stars, and Pink

For Every Hat Purchased Power In One will donate $5.00 to the Dream Defenders' Dream Fund.  Learn more about the Dream Defenders' movement at www.dreamdefenders.org .

Wear the POWER and in the spirit of the Dream Defenders...Be the POWER!

name: 'I Love' Light-Weight Hoodie
description:
The Power that resides in the Love of your History, Culture and People transcends into the Love of Yourself...A Love that truly can inspire the world!  

Join the Love Campaign by purchasing this powerful light-weight hoodie that transcends love of self.

Available in Unisex fit in Indigo.

name: DC GENTLEMAN JERSEY TEE
description:
A DC Gentleman is a chivalrous, courteous, or honorable man.  A man of calm demeanor, strong preserve, intellectual thinking, and polite yet meaningful speech.

Unisex sizes small to xxx large

name: Boom BaPIO Black T-Shirt
description:
In hip-hop music, boom bap is a style of record production. "Boom Bap" is an onomatopoeia for the drum sounds prominent in boom bap. Boom Bap is a style of hip hop signified by a hard bass drum and snapping snare that is often EQed to the forefront of the beat. The popular hip hop music style was made famous in the 90â€™s.
 
Who is Boom Bap?  All of these artists have songs that incorporate the style of Boom Bap: KRS-One, Kendrick Lamar, J Cole, DJ Premier, Pete Rock, EPMD, Marley Marl, Common, Mos Def, Talib Kweli, A Tribe Called Quest, J Dilla, Black Milk, Lupe Fiasco, 9th Wonder, De La Soul, Busta Rhymes and Kev!n L!ve Handsome Beloved
 
Power In One honors the Boom Bap with the new "Boom BaPIO" shirt in limited supply.  Get yours today.

name: PIO Founders' Hoodie
description:
The PIO Founders' Hoodie tells the story of how three brothers from two cities, Charlotte and Washington, DC, unify as one to empower the world with fashion and an idea that we all have the power to effect millions.  Thus, the DC logo on one sleeve and the Charlotte logo on the other.  

Help us tell the story of PIO: Tale of Two Cities!

name: Protected by the Ancestors
description:
As PIO continues to honor Mother Africa, we honor the strength, endurance, creativity, and love from our Ancestors that protects and guides us each and every day!  

This unisex long sleeve tee is in black with gold print and features the PIO logo on the back tag area.

Express your Power and honor the Power from the Ancestors!

name: I Love Tee
description:
The Power that resides in the Love of your History, Culture and People transcends into the Love of Yourself...A Love that truly can inspire the world!  

Join the Love Campaign by purchasing this powerful tee that transcends love of self.

The I Love Tee is available in select color combinations in unisex fit and lady's fit.

*Please note lady's fit tees are meant to hug the body and you should purchase a size larger than normal.*

name: PIO Impression Sweatshirt
description: This light weight Black sweatshirt features the PIO logo in grey/red print with the 'Empowering Lifestyles' motto on the sleeve.  Stimulate your power and others this winter in the Black PIO Impression Sweatshirt.

name: Signature PIO Sweatshirt
description: This light weight Power Green sweatshirt features the PIO logo in black print with the 'Empowering Lifestyles' motto on the sleeve.  Stimulate your power and others this winter in the Signature PIO Sweatshirt.

name: Africa Unity Tank
description:
In honor of Mother Africa and her contribution to civilization globally, we introduce the Africa Unity Tank.  Power In One with the continent of Africa serves as a reminder of the empowerment that lies in the concept of unity.  

Available in Unisex Fit.

name: The Cool-Out Summer Expression Tank
description: Make a PIO impression this summer by purchasing this unisex tank.  There is no better way to express your PIO and support the PIO movement.  The Cool-Out Tank also features the #1 hand symbol on the back.

name: The Force of A Lion Tank
description:
At PIO we encourage you to approach every challenge in life with Force, express your PIO with this unisex tank top.  

The Lion reflects solar, splendor, power, majesty, strength, courage, and nobility.

name: PIO Impression T (Black)
description: Make a PIO impression by purchasing this unisex t-shirt.  There is no better way to express your PIO and support the PIO movement.  Impression T also features the #1 hand symbol on the back.

name: Buzz Appeal Impression T
description:
The Teal and Purple color scheme joins the PIO Impression T wears in the boutique.  If you are from the Queen City of Charlotte, NC...you already know what Buzz Appeal is all about!  

Make an Impression today with this latest PIO Impression T design.  Available in Unisex and Lady's Fit.

name: Africa Uni-Tee (Black)
description:
In honor of Mother Africa and its contribution to civilization globally, we introduce the Africa Uni-Tee.  Power In One with the continent of Africa serves as a reminder of the empowerment that lies in the concept of unity.  This shirt features the 'Empowering Lifestyles' motto on the sleeve in Red and PIO logo on the back tag line location in Green.  The Africa Uni-Tee is available in Lady's Fit and Unisex Fit. 

The Lady's Fit are SLIM FIT tees, designed to hug your body and tend to run a size small. For a looser fit, please order a size larger than your normal size in the lady fit version.

name: Courageous Leopard (Red) Tee
description:
The leopard represents courage.  We at Power In One believe that your outward appearance should represent what lives inside.  When you wear the Courageous Leopard shirt you are declaring your strength in the face of any obstacle.  Courage over Fear...Wear it boldly.

Available in unisex fit.

name: Ryan Lucas
description: The Ryan Lucas line from Power In One (PIO) features apparel motivated by the sound and gift of music!  Our first featured artist is Ryan Lucas, his music gives voice to the next generation of the Black church and the African diaspora.  His style of rapping reminds us of the rich history and role of the Church and its ability to motivate others to move into action by sounds.  We are thrilled to have Ryan Lucas apart of the PIO brand.  To support the sound of Ryan Lucas visit RyanLucasMusic.com.  Be sure to purchase here the inaugural Ryan Lucas T-Shirt featuring the RL Boombox in gold print.

name: Lady's Pink Impression V-Neck
description: In celebration of Power In One's 1 Year Anniversary, we present a special Fall design for the ladies.  Pink Impression T with royal blue and grey print.  Receive Free Shipping for a limited time.  Available in Plus Sizes as well.

name: Red Label 10mm Round Stone Bead Bracelets - Mbilli
description:
1) Ghana Glass Beads
2) Picasso Jasper
3) Unity Multi-Stone

Available in 7.5" and 8".  If you would like it larger or smaller please email ryan@pioclothing.com

Designed by Kevin Live! Handsome Beloved
